original_text: But among these there was not a man of them whom Moses and Aaron the priest numbered, when they numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
korean_text: 모세와 제사장 아론이 시내 광야에서 계수한 이스라엘 자손은 한 사람도 들지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: But among these there was not a man of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이들 중에는 그들 중 한 사람도 없었으니

sentences.original_text: whom Moses and Aaron the priest numbered
when they numbered the children of Israel
